doc:
Douglas Fowley https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Douglas_Fowley 0 Douglas Fowley (born Daniel Vincent Fowley, May 30, 1911 – May 21, 1998) was an American movie and television actor in more than 240 films and dozens of television programs, He is probably best remembered for his role as the frustrated movie director Roscoe Dexter in Singin' in the Rain (1952), and for his regular supporting role as Doc Holliday in The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp. He is the father of rock and roll musician and record producer Kim Fowley. Douglas_Fowley ( born Daniel_Vincent_Fowley , May_30_,_1911 – May_21_,_1998 ) was an_American_movie_and_television_actor in more_than_240_films_and_dozens of television_programs , He is_probably_best_remembered for his_role as the_frustrated_movie_director_Roscoe_Dexter in Singin ' in the_Rain ( 1952 ) , and for his_regular_supporting_role as Doc_Holliday in The_Life_and_Legend of Wyatt_Earp . He is the_father of rock_and_roll_musician_and_record_producer_Kim_Fowley .
